comments.body: The copyright is a lot simpler now, you only need a few lines. See http://docs.ansible.com/ansible/latest/dev_guide/developing_modules_documenting.html#copyright for what has changed.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +1,5 @@#!powershell

# (c) 2017, Andrew Saraceni <andrew.saraceni@gmail.com>
